archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.3.2c: c) identifying information exposed in the event endpoint or mobile devices are lost, stolen or damaged (e.g. the type, classification and volume of sensitive information stored on the devices).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
